channel.title: BoomScape ★ 718/742 Cache ★ 24/7 ★ Friendly Users ★ Active Community ★ Active Se
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5]BoomScape 718[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[B]Webclient[/B] [URL=http://"http://boomscape.co.uk/webclient"]Boom Scape - Webclient[/URL]
[B]Website[/B] [URL=http://"http://boomscape.co.uk/"]Boom Scape - 718 RSPS[/URL]
[B]Download Client[/B] [URL=http://"http://boomscape.co.uk/boomscape718.jar"]BoomScape.jar[/URL]
[B]Forums[/B] [URL=http://"http://boomscape.co.uk/forum/forum.php"]Boom Scape Forums[/URL]
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Features on Boom Scape
- Dominion Tower - Gilded Altar - Castle Wars - Squeal of Fortune - Money Pouch - Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights. - Duel Arena with Staking. - Glacors with fire spell weekness. - Forinthry Dungeon for pvp items. - Loyalty Shop - Kuradals Dungeon - FightCaves / Fight Kiln with all waves - Queen Black Dragon - Barrows 100% - Jadinko Lair - Frost Dragons - Slayer Tower with all floors (including slayer task system) - Polypore Dungeon - Corporeal Beast - Kalphite Queen - Tormented Demons - Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin - Teleblock fully working[/COLOR]
[B][CENTER]BoomScape Images[/CENTER][/B]
[B]Home [IMG]http://gyazo.com/41344c814d46695557c3875499b9ab71.png[/img]
Farming [IMG]http://gyazo.com/cd78565ca5e2dec13630119961d99424.png[/img]
Runecrafting [IMG]http://gyazo.com/837c9561195107df003a33c6aa806d3a.png[/img]
Glacors [IMG]http://gyazo.com/d1311638f3ff88140480fc7ff2c02dbe.png[/img]
Custom Boss, Pest Queen [IMG]http://gyazo.com/4b12d58fccbcac36e799eed66f96e01d.png[/img]
Squeal Of Fortune Fixed Interface [IMG]http://gyazo.com/2b27c46d8d0a4f7d2ae0335c7b8cb7bd.png[/img]
Crystal Chest giving Barrows Items [IMG]http://gyazo.com/16015d0deea6b50cb486b1d125ed6f51.png[/img]
Max Cape Dialogue [IMG]http://gyazo.com/6a98d3bdc4636de52e3ce5ef6b25ccda.png[/img]
Queen Black Dragon [IMG]http://gyazo.com/72ede682977ad7ab5751ec67cc71ddb0.png[/img]
King Black Dragon [IMG]http://gyazo.com/563b65ff62d935e81bc1ca26a49f42de.png[/img]
Summoning with 3 shops [IMG]http://gyazo.com/6ece46e2b8b430fcd8a58494995bc582.png[/img]
Fight Kiln [IMG]http://gyazo.com/758d7279c2d574dd0803b1e2a5a6e3a6.png[/img]
Training area for higher levels [IMG]http://gyazo.com/48c5c167d8cf7308e9d5ba49d3158775.png[/img]
Clue Scrolls Rewards [IMG]http://gyazo.com/589d07c820c9f393090b4b0f89018f82.png[/img][/B]
Comp Cape Requirements [IMG]http://gyazo.com/293ca505308db5babf21110cf3369324.png[/img]
[B]Message to users who join Boom Scape[/B]
[I]We welcome you and hope you enjoy your experience on Boom Scape, if you see anything that isn't on Boom and you want it added then be sure to make a thread on the forums in the Ideas section, I check the forums every day to make sure Boom is the best RSPS out there and is managed as best it can be. Also if you need any help on Boom then be sure to do ::ticket to get in contact with me or one of our Staff members. If you don't enjoy Boom Scape then please leave us some feedback on what you didn't like about the game & what you think we should change, feedback from our users is very important as it allows me to improve the game.
Thanks for looking and hope you enjoy Boom Scape![/I]

[COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Features on Boom Scape

  • Dominion Tower
  • Gilded Altar
  • Castle Wars
  • Squeal of Fortune
  • Money Pouch
  • Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights.
  • Duel Arena with Staking.
  • Glacors with fire spell weekness.
  • Forinthry Dungeon for pvp items.
  • Loyalty Shop
  • Kuradals Dungeon
  • FightCaves / Fight Kiln with all waves
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Barrows 100%
  • Jadinko Lair
  • Frost Dragons
  • Slayer Tower with all floors (including slayer task system)
  • Polypore Dungeon
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Tormented Demons
  • Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin
  • Teleblock fully working[/COLOR]

Message to users who join Boom Scape

[I]We welcome you and hope you enjoy your experience on Boom Scape, if you see anything that isn’t on Boom and you want it added then be sure to make a thread on the forums in the Ideas section, I check the forums every day to make sure Boom is the best RSPS out there and is managed as best it can be. Also if you need any help on Boom then be sure to do ::ticket to get in contact with me or one of our Staff members. If you don’t enjoy Boom Scape then please leave us some feedback on what you didn’t like about the game & what you think we should change, feedback from our users is very important as it allows me to improve the game.

Thanks for looking and hope you enjoy Boom Scape![/I]
